name: Granny:Underground
description:
Do you have a grandma? Do you wonder where she gets those strange items and candies you have never seen before in any store? Because we know.... It's from the Granny Mafia. Their secrets have been unfolded... This new granny gave us full details into their hideout. This is her story in the new world of Granny Underground......

It is a very short demo but I hope you all like it.

Enough positive reviews and I'll make a full game.
